AI Description: Intel Threading Building Blocks (TBB) is a widely used C++ template library developed by Intel for parallel programming on multi-core processors. TBB provides higher-level abstractions for parallelism, making it easier to write code that can take advantage of multicore processors.
Core Features: Task-Based Parallelism, Data Parallelism, Concurrency, Scalability, Thread Safety
General Tags: Parallel Programming, Multi-Core Processors, C++ Template Library, Intel
